summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 78E, Page 184 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property in the South Park neighborhood, which consists of the parcel bounded by 10th and 12th Avenues South, South Henderson Street and South Trenton Street, from Single Family Residential (SF 5000) to Multi-family Residential (Lowrise 2) Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Ivor A. Jones and Jack R. Jones, C.F. 289071.)
